name: Penguin for a Day
description:
PENGUIN FOR A DAY

Penguin for a Day is a 3D platform game developed by Lazy Sloth, in which we play as Finny, a teenager who has been magically turned into a penguin. To help him recover his body, you must explore different places in the arctic as a flightless bird. Jumping across platforms, sliding on the ice and dealing with all kind of enemies, you will have to reach the Misty Mountain's summit and solve the mistery behind his transformation. 

Suggestions: 

  • Use an Xbox or GameCube controller.
